formattedAddress: 125 Carder Rd, New York, NY 10004, USA
adrFormatAddress: 125 Carder Rd, New York, NY 10004, USA

editorialSummary.text: Trendy outdoor Mexican eatery & bar with lively events & a palm-studded seating area on the bay.

originalText.text: The guacamole was a lot better than expected. We had the cocktail bowl of the gitanos margarita (it could have def been stronger and too much ice). The food was quite good. Our waiter was very friendly and helpful.  The vibe and decor of the place was fun. The disco ball in the middle was a highlight of the place. Music had us dancing.  It's a shame it ends at 11pm. The location was pretty easy to get to by the ferry ,about 10 mns altogether from the dock.

text.text: The guacamole was a lot better than expected. We had the cocktail bowl of the gitanos margarita (it could have def been stronger and too much ice). The food was quite good. Our waiter was very friendly and helpful.  The vibe and decor of the place was fun. The disco ball in the middle was a highlight of the place. Music had us dancing.  It's a shame it ends at 11pm. The location was pretty easy to get to by the ferry ,about 10 mns altogether from the dock.

originalText.text: Very lively and fun place to go with a group or as a couple. Atmosphere feels like an escape from the concrete jungle and gives getaway vibes. Food is delicious.  Service is great. Reservations are needed unless you plan to hang out at the bar as this place gets packed.  I have been here twice and will be going back.

text.text: Very lively and fun place to go with a group or as a couple. Atmosphere feels like an escape from the concrete jungle and gives getaway vibes. Food is delicious.  Service is great. Reservations are needed unless you plan to hang out at the bar as this place gets packed.  I have been here twice and will be going back.

originalText.text: You come here for the atmosphere, service is great and fast, but the food is pretty average. After opening in different locations throughout the years around NYC, the menu remains mostly the same which is not good considering the food is not that great. Drinks and desserts are delicious tho, I had a mocktail and my friends had cocktails. Overall recommend for the experience.

text.text: You come here for the atmosphere, service is great and fast, but the food is pretty average. After opening in different locations throughout the years around NYC, the menu remains mostly the same which is not good considering the food is not that great. Drinks and desserts are delicious tho, I had a mocktail and my friends had cocktails. Overall recommend for the experience.

originalText.text:
This place is overrated. We booked reservation a week in advanced and took a ferry just to be disappointed by their food and service.
First of all, we reserved a beach lounge for brunch and were taken to a crowded canopy area instead. When we asked about this, we were told the beach lounges were closed, which was not true because we saw people sitting at the beach lounges.
Secondly, the food was mediocre at best for a place advertised itself as an upscale dining experience. We could have eaten much better meals at a cheaper Mexican canteen. They charged $20 for 2 bottles of water. We paid $73+ for 2 dishes and 2 bottles of water. I guess maybe this is New York City prices?
Finally, the location is not convenient to get to, but the atmosphere was not horrible. That’s the only good thing I can say about it. Overall, don’t bother with this place unless you have money to waste and don’t care too much about the quality of the food.

originalText.text:
Pros:

The property is beautiful. The bar is beautiful. The beach is spacious with lots of pockets of people. The views are stunning! They really did such a great job w the design and layout of this property. Bathrooms are super clean.

Non pros:

They shouldn’t market themselves as a beach club, they are not. Renting a daybed here isn’t worth it because they aren’t in the sun.

Our waiter could not tell us abt the menu. He didn’t understand our questions and when we asked to speak w a server that could answer our questions, he offered different food. Waiters should know the menu.

The food was covered with waaaaaay too much sauce. It was heavy and not enjoyable.
